entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon.
